pre_caption: The video starts with a low-angle shot, showing the lower body of a woman from the waist down, positioned in the bottom center of the frame and occupying the middle ground. As she performs rotations, she moves upwards, transitioning the view into a full shot where her entire body is visible near the center, slightly towards the right side of the frame.
